txt_en: It's everything you've been through that makes you who you are.
Brains count for more than muscles.
What is true and right is true and right for all.
I don't mind being alone. I just don't want to be insignificant.
txt_cn: 我不介意孤身独行，却不想活得微不足道。

txt_en: Very few things that are worthwhile in life come without a cost.
It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
txt_cn: 心无挂碍，才能自由自在。

txt_en: There is no limit to what women can accomplish.
May the future bring us all the best.
True love really does win the day!
If you want something done right, do it yourself.
txt_cn: 主动行动，才能获得成功。

txt_en: The whole tree does not die because one branch falls.
txt_cn: 就算枝叶凋零，树木依旧生长。

txt_en: Surprise yourself so you can surprise the audience.
txt_cn: 只有惊艳自己，才能惊艳他人。

txt_en: Love should never be a secret.
The key to acquiring proficiency in any task is repetition.
txt_cn: 勤学苦练才能熟能生巧。
